titles: A defence of the absolution given to Sr. William Perkins, at the place of execution, April the 3d with a further vindication thereof, occasioned by a paper, entituled A declararion of the sense of the arch-bishops and bishops, &c.
author: Collier, Jeremy, 1650-1726.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Williams, John, 1636?-1709. --  Declaration of the sense of the archbishops and bishops.
